fields.label: Body
fields.description: Font for body text

fields.label: Heading
fields.description: Font for headings

fields.label: Links
fields.description: Font for links

fields.name: accent
fields.label: Accent
fields.description: Font for accents

fields.name: businessId
fields.label: Business ID (Required)
fields.description: This is the GoNationID of the business. Can be found at https://www.gonation.com/

fields.name: body
fields.label: Body
fields.description: Font for body text

fields.name: heading
fields.label: Heading
fields.description: Font for headings

fields.name: links
fields.label: Links
fields.description: Font for links

fields.name: accent
fields.label: Accent
fields.description: Font for accents

fields.name: poweredId
fields.label: Powered ID
fields.description: For legacy sites (around pre 2013). These are ID's that don't have biz in front of it.

fields.name: domain
fields.label: Website Domain
fields.description: The full domain of the website. Ex: https://www.gonationsites.com. For SEO purposes only.

fields.name: displayFixedBarCTA
fields.label: Display Fixed Bar CTA
fields.description: Display fixed bar CTA. This is a thin CTA clickable bar above the navigation.

fields.name: storyName
fields.label: Story Name
fields.description: The name of the story you want to be displayed. If Display Fixed Bar CTA is true, this is required.

fields.name: label
fields.label: CTA Label
fields.description: The actual text of what will be displayed for the CTA button.

fields.name: url
fields.label: CTA URL
fields.description: The URL of the CTA button.

fields.name: name
fields.label: Name
fields.description: Name of the page in the navbar.

fields.name: path
fields.label: Path
fields.description: Path of the page. If not provided, the name will be used as the path slugified.

fields.name: pageDescription
fields.label: Page Description
fields.description: Description of the page for SEO purposes.

fields.name: customPageHero
fields.label: Custom Page Hero
fields.description: Custom page hero image

fields.name: hidePageHero
fields.label: Hide Page Hero
fields.description: Whether or not we should hide the page hero. Defaults to false. Normally we will set this to false if homepage, assuming we are using a more custom hero component.

fields.name: hidden
fields.label: Is hidden in the navigation
fields.description: If true, the route will still exist, however it won't exist within the navigation.

fields.name: isPrimaryCalledToAction
fields.label: Is Primary Called To Action
fields.description: If true, the route will be the primary CTA in the navbar. (special styles)

fields.name: fetchingStrategy
fields.label: Fetching Strategy
fields.description: Choose whether the fetching strategy is static or server-based. If nothing selected, we default to static.

fields.name: stories
fields.label: Stories
fields.description: Stories

fields.name: shout
fields.label: Shout
fields.description: Shout

fields.name: poweredImages
fields.label: Powered Images
fields.description: Powered Images

fields.name: about
fields.label: About
fields.description: About

fields.name: menuInventory
fields.label: Menu Inventory
fields.description: Menu Inventory

fields.name: gallery
fields.label: Gallery
fields.description: Gallery

fields.name: events
fields.label: Events
fields.description: Events

fields.name: layout
fields.label: Layout
fields.description: Layout that will be referenced to get content for this page.

fields.name: footerTag
fields.label: Footer Tag (Optional)
fields.description: Tag to use for the footer. If not provided, we will use the tag from the first route.

fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.label: Background Image
fields.description: Choose the type of background for the Expandable Shout.

fields.label: Custom Background
fields.name: customBackground
fields.description: Provide a URL if "Custom" is selected for Background Image.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.description: Provide a hex (e.g. #FF5733) or rgba (e.g. rgba(255,87,51,1)) value if "Solid Color" is selected for Background Image.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.hint: Provide a hex (e.g. #FF5733) or rgba (e.g. rgba(255,87,51,1)) value.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
